title: What Is True Any More? | Guests: Ben Domenech & Shelley Luther | 4/30/20
description:
Glenn has no idea what’s true any more, as news sites that weren’t covering the Tara Reade and Michael Flynn stories are now acting like they were the whole time. New FBI notes suggest that agents wanted Flynn to lie and get fired. The New York Times rebuked the Biden campaign for claiming its Tara Reade investigation proves he’s innocent. Even some Democrats like actress Rose McGowan are tired of the #MeToo hypocrisy. The Federalist co-founder Ben Domenech joins to discuss how his joke on Twitter became a federal case. Dallas salon owner Shelley Luther joins before heading to court and possibly jail for continuing to keep her shop open. And new unemployment claims are down! It’s only the FIFTH worst week in U.S. history!
